subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Mughal Emperor initiated the construction of the Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चिट्टोगराघर की सैंकड़ी करने की क्षेत्रीकार मुगल निर्देशक थे
explanation_en: Akbar is the Mughal Emperor who initiated the construction of the Chittorgarh Fort. The fort is a prime example of Rajput architecture and stands as a symbol of the valor and bravery of the Rajputs during the medieval period.
explanation_hi: अक्बर यह चैटरगर के बनने के लिए उसका आर्जूई को लेना है। चैटरगर का संतुलकर राजशान के लोकपुर का एक राजशान के आर्जूई को लेना है। चैटरगर का संतुलकर राजशान के लोकपुर का एक राजशान के आर्जूई को लेना है।
question_hi: चैटरगर का संतुलकर राजशान के लोकपुर एक राजशान के आर्जूई को लेना है।
A_hi: राजकार के आर्जूई को लेना है।
A_en: The construction of the Chittorgarh Fort was initiated by Rana Kumbha.

B_en: Rana Kumbha initiated the construction of the Chittorgarh Fort.

question_en: Which Rana initiated the construction of the Chittorgarh Fort?

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the Rana who built the Chittorgarh Fort?
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha is known for his achievements in warfare and governance, which include the construction of various forts and palaces in Rajasthan. Chittorgarh Fort is one of them.
explanation_hi: राजकार कुमब कोमब कार कुमब राजकार कुमब

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which campaign is associated with Vikramshila?
explanation_en: Vikramshila was a campaign by Rana Kumbha, who was a famous warrior and king of Mewar region. The campaign is related to the conquest of Mewar region by Rana Kumbha.
Rana Kumbha initiated the Vikramshila Campaign. Vikramshila is a battle fought between him and Guhil Rathore.
The Battle of Vikramshila was fought between Rana Kumbha and Guhil Rathore. Vikramshila is an important battle in Rajasthan History.
question_en: Who fought the Battle of Vikramshila?
